Name: Phoenix
Desc:
Temporarily summons the Phoenix of Fire Element. The Phoenix has a chance of Stunning enemies.
The Phoenix's attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status. Also increases DEF permanently.

Desc.Old: Temporarily summons the Phoenix of Fire Element. The Phoenix attacks up to 4 enemies at once with a chance of Binding them. The Phoenix's attacks do not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status. Also increases DEF permanently.
Desc.New:
Temporarily summons the Phoenix of Fire Element. The Phoenix has a chance of Stunning enemies.
The Phoenix's attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status. Also increases DEF permanently.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 70. Summons Phoenix for 220 sec. Attacks up to 4 enemies at 390% damage. 95% chance to Stun.
[Passive Effect: DEF +30%]
H.New:
MP Cost: 70. Summons a Phoenix for 220 sec.
The Phoenix attacks up to 4 enemies at 390% Damage, with a 95 chance of Stunning them.
[Passive Effects: DEF +30%]
